about_the_game:
Attention! Identical packages can not be activated on the same account twice!
Attention! Identical ships from different purchased bundles are not compensated!

This pack includes:

  • Improved version of the rank 16 frigate “Reaper”
  • “Harpoon” launcher
  • Tractor beam
  • Regenerating shield
  • Unique character portrait “Yonda Augras”

Special bonus for everyone who buys the bundle — Premium license for 30 days!

An extremely powerful frigate of unknown model that used to belong to a pirate baron, terrorizing a fringe Federation sector. The best pilots of the Federation were sent to destroy this impressive ship, but no one returned alive. As a result of many reconnaissance operations, the construction and weaknesses in the frigate’s hull were revealed. As a result, the baron was destroyed along with the ship. Now certain shipyards are can assemble a replica of this ship, and for an additional fee can reinforce the thin layers of armor because of which the original ship was destroyed.
detailed_description:
Attention! Identical packages can not be activated on the same account twice!
Attention! Identical ships from different purchased bundles are not compensated!

This pack includes:

  • Improved version of the rank 16 frigate “Reaper”
  • “Harpoon” launcher
  • Tractor beam
  • Regenerating shield
  • Unique character portrait “Yonda Augras”

Special bonus for everyone who buys the bundle — Premium license for 30 days!

An extremely powerful frigate of unknown model that used to belong to a pirate baron, terrorizing a fringe Federation sector. The best pilots of the Federation were sent to destroy this impressive ship, but no one returned alive. As a result of many reconnaissance operations, the construction and weaknesses in the frigate’s hull were revealed. As a result, the baron was destroyed along with the ship. Now certain shipyards are can assemble a replica of this ship, and for an additional fee can reinforce the thin layers of armor because of which the original ship was destroyed.

name: Star Conflict - Reaper

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2.3 GHz, Intel Core 2 Duo / 2.5 GHz, AMD A6-9220
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Video Card: 512 MB, NVidia / AMD Radeon / Intel (HD 3000, HD 4000) with support for Pixel Shader 3.0 (AMD Radeon X1000 not supported)
  • Hard Disk Space: 8.5 GB
  • Additional: Broadband Internet connection
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: 2.3 GHz, Intel Core 2 Duo / 2.5 GHz, AMD A6-9220
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Video Card: 1024 MB, NVidia GeForce 650 / AMD Radeon HD 5750
  • Hard Disk Space: 8.5 GB
  • Additional: Broadband Internet connection

short_description: This pack includes:Improved version of the rank 16 frigate “Reaper”“Harpoon” launcherTractor beamRegenerating shieldUnique character portrait “Yonda Augras”Special bonus for everyone who buys the bundle — Premium license for 30 days!
supported_languages:
English*, Russian*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Portugal, Polish, Hungarian, Czech, Ukrainian, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
